title: Welcome to our new website
body:
**Our new website is live!**

Our DIY events see residential homes and local venues in Manchester undergo metamorphosis into cinemas, galleries and concert halls that come down as quickly as they go up.

We hope the website will serve as a great platform to let people know about all the great [events we've got going on](/events).

Keep an eye on the website for all our upcoming events or [get in touch](/contact) if you would like to get involved.

Have a good one!
author: Dan
